Drag Strip revs his engine, turns sharply and brakes at the same 
time, sliding into Wildrider sideswiping him taking out his legs, 
"Haha, I win! Now what was that? Something about stopping?" as 
Drag Strip transforms, jumping up and landing facing Wildrider.



On 17 Jan 2001, at 19:20, Robert Dahl wrote:

> Quite far away from where Astrotrain set down a cloud of dust billows. Then
> stops as it's trailed by another one. Viewing around a huge fallen log
> Wildrider transforms to robot mode, and for the first time looks jittery.
> "Holy, things are quiet" he starts to shake until the sound of his comrades
> motor is heard. Then as he regains his composure he jumps in front of the
> other car waving his hands signalling a stop.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
